name: digital-marketing-pro
description: Comprehensive digital marketing intelligence system with 13 specialist agents, brand guidelines enforcement, adaptive scoring, MCP integrations for your own marketing accounts, and persistent campaign memory. 16 integrated modules covering strategy, execution, and measurement across all channels, business models, and industries — including dedicated Technical SEO, Local SEO, and Marketing Automation modules. 42 slash commands for direct workflow access — covering the complete agency lifecycle from client onboarding to QBRs. 117 reference knowledge files powering deep domain expertise. Agents call 34 Python scripts for deterministic scoring, query 18 MCP servers for live data, enforce brand guidelines, and persist campaign learnings. Import voice guides, restrictions, channel styles, templates, and agency SOPs. Compliance guardrails, AEO/GEO optimization, crisis communication, sales enablement, media planning, video scripting, attribution modeling, and emerging channel support.

author.name: Indranil Banerjee
author.title: Head of AI Transformation & Group Lead - Digital Marketing
